Here is some inline code `r 1+1`

```{r, starwars_plot, fig.cap="A ggplot of starwars stuff"}
library(tidyverse)
starwars %>%
  filter(species=="Human") %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x=height,y=mass)+
  geom_point()
```

We can see Figure \ref(fig:starwars_plot)...


```{r starwars-tbl}
starwars %>%
  filter(species=="Human") %>%
  select(name,height,mass,homeworld) %>%
  knitr::kable(caption="A knitr kable table of starwars data")
```
We can see in Table \@ref(tab:starwars-tbl) a subset of the starwars dataset

```{r my-fig, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="Star Strooper"}
knitr::include_graphics("./myimage.jpg")
```

A stormtrooper image above \@ref(fig:my-fig)
